TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit X509Certificate2UI extends System.Object
public ref class X509Certificate2UI abstract sealed

summary.span: 显示的用户界面对话框使您可以选择和查看 X.509 证书。

span.span: Displays user interface dialogs that allow you to select and view X.509 certificates.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的方法存在用户界面对话框显示有关 X.509 证书的详细的信息或允许用户选择一个或多个证书的 X.509 证书的集合中的类。Use the methods of the class to present user interface dialogs that display detailed information about an X.509 certificate or allow users to select one or more certificates from a collection of X.509 certificates. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示用户界面对话框以选择和查看 X.509 证书。The following code example demonstrates how to display user interface dialogs to select and view X.509 certificates. [!code-cpp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

summary.span: 显示一个对话框，其中包含 X.509 证书及其关联证书链的属性。

span.span: Displays a dialog box that contains the properties of an X.509 certificate and its associated certificate chain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法显示有关指定的 X.509 证书的详细信息的对话框。This method displays a dialog box with detailed information about the specified X.509 certificate. 对话框中包括用于安装或复制证书的按钮。The dialog box includes buttons for installing or copying the certificate.

param.span: 要显示的 X.509 证书。

span.span: The X.509 certificate to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法显示有关指定的 X.509 证书的详细信息的对话框。The method displays a dialog box with detailed information about the specified X.509 certificate. 对话框中包括用于安装或复制证书的按钮。The dialog box includes buttons for installing or copying the certificate. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示用户界面对话框以选择和查看 X.509 证书。The following code example demonstrates how to display user interface dialogs to select and view X.509 certificates. [!code-cpp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

param.span: 要显示的 X.509 证书。

span.span: The X.509 certificate to display.

param.name: hwndParent
param.span: 用于显示对话框的父窗口的句柄。

summary.span: 使用父窗口的句柄显示一个对话框，其中包含 X.509 证书及其关联证书链的属性。

span.span: Displays a dialog box that contains the properties of an X.509 certificate and its associated certificate chain using a handle to a parent window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法显示有关指定的 X.509 证书的详细信息的对话框。The method displays a dialog box with detailed information about the specified X.509 certificate. 此方法可用于嵌套显示证书的信息的对话框。This method can be used to nest dialog boxes that display certificate information. 对话框中包括用于安装或复制证书的按钮。The dialog box includes buttons for installing or copying the certificate.

span.span: The parameter is .
The parameter is invalid.

permission.span: 直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任的或透明的代码使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: 显示一个从证书集合中选择 X.509 证书的对话框。

span.span: Displays a dialog box for selecting an X.509 certificate from a certificate collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要求用户手动选择 X.509 证书使用一个对话框，请使用此方法。Use this method if you require users to manually select X.509 certificates using a dialog box. 如果无需用户交互是必需的使用方法。If no user interaction is required, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection SelectFromCollection (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection certificates, string title, string message, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SelectionFlag selectionFlag);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection SelectFromCollection(class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection certificates, string title, string message, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SelectionFlag selectionFlag) cil managed
Public Shared Function SelectFromCollection (certificates As X509Certificate2Collection, title As String, message As String, selectionFlag As X509SelectionFlag) As X509Certificate2Collection

public: static System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2Collection ^ SelectFromCollection(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2Collection ^ certificates, System::String ^ title, System::String ^ message, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509SelectionFlag selectionFlag);

static member SelectFromCollection : System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection * string * string * System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SelectionFlag -> System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection

param.name: certificates
param.span: X.509 证书的集合，从中选择相应的证书。

span.span: A collection of X.509 certificates to select from.
The title of the dialog box.

param.name: message
param.span: 指导用户的描述性消息。

span.span: A descriptive message to guide the user.

param.span: 该消息显示在对话框中。

span.span: The message is displayed in the dialog box.

param.name: selectionFlag
param.span: 值之一，用于指定允许单项选择还是允许多项选择。

span.span: One of the values that specifies whether single or multiple selections are allowed.

summary.span: 显示一个从证书集合中选择 X.509 证书的对话框。

span.span: Displays a dialog box for selecting an X.509 certificate from a certificate collection.

returns.span: 一个 对象，包含选定的一个或多个证书。

span.span: An object that contains the selected certificate or certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用如果要求用户手动选择使用对话框中的 X.509 证书的方法。Use the method if you require users to manually select X.509 certificates using a dialog box. 如果无需用户交互是必需的使用方法。If no user interaction is required, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示用户界面对话框以选择和查看 X.509 证书。The following code example demonstrates how to display user interface dialogs to select and view X.509 certificates. [!code-cpp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]
